com.isti.traceview.gui
Interface IScaleModeState

All Known Implementing Classes:
ScaleModeAbstract, ScaleModeAuto, ScaleModeCom, ScaleModeXhair
public interface IScaleModeState

State pattern realization for scale mode. Scale mode defines method of trace scaling inside each Slot
